code: import{combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{legacy_createStore as createStore}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import{plantListReducer,plantDetailsReducer}from'./reducers/plantReducers';import{orderSubscribe}from"./reducers/orderReducers";import{userLoginReducer,userUpdateReducer,userPaymentReducer,cancelSubscriptionReducer,userDetailsReducer,UserListReducer}from'./reducers/accountReducers';var reducer=combineReducers({plantList:plantListReducer,plantDetails:plantDetailsReducer,userUpdate:userUpdateReducer,userPayment:userPaymentReducer,userLogin:userLoginReducer,userDetails:userDetailsReducer,userList:UserListReducer,cancelSubscription:cancelSubscriptionReducer,orderSubscribe:orderSubscribe});var userInfoFromStorage=localStorage.getItem('userInfo')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')):null;var intialState={userLogin:{userInfo:userInfoFromStorage}};var middleware=[thunk];var store=createStore(reducer,intialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export default store;
